title: Cannot compile native with GraalVM and Azure
body:
### Describe the bug

Hi!
I am trying to compile my app with `Quarkus 3.0.4.Final` in native but there is this error:

```
Error encountered while parsing com.microsoft.azure.proton.transport.proxy.impl.DigestProxyChallengeProcessorImpl.getHeader() 
Parsing context:
   at com.microsoft.azure.proton.transport.proxy.impl.DigestProxyChallengeProcessorImpl.getHeader(DigestProxyChallengeProcessorImpl.java:53)
```


The full stack is:
```

Failed generating 'step-trackactions-be-int-runner' after 1m 28s.
Error: Image build request failed with exit status 1
```

I think is a problem with this dependency:
```
<dependency>
            <groupId>com.azure</groupId>
            <artifactId>azure-messaging-servicebus</artifactId>
</dependency>
```

the CD/CI pipeline (Gitlab) is:
```
build:
  image:
    name: softinstigate/graalvm-maven:latest
    entrypoint: [""]
  script:
    - source /root/.bashrc
    - mvn package $MAVEN_OPTS -Pnative -DskipTests -Dquarkus.native.builder-image=graalvm
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

maven:3.8.3-openjdk-17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

softinstigate/graalvm-maven:latest

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.4.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvnw

### Additional information

_No response_
